mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INACTIVE_USER_T ( SELECT USER_NO, U.EMAIL, PW, NAME, GENDER, MOBILE, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, AGREE, STATE, PW_MODIFIED_AT, JOINED_AT, SYSDATE FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_T A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, LOGIN_AT) >= 12 OR (LOGIN_AT IS NULL AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, JOINED_AT) >= 12) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_T WHERE EMAIL IN(SELECT U.EMAIL FROM USER_T U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_T A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, LOGIN_AT) >= 12 OR (LOGIN_AT IS NULL AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, JOINED_AT) >= 12))
